name: Patience in Waiting
content: Patience is not the ability to wait, but the ability to keep a good attitude while waiting. ---- by Joyce Meyer

comments.comment: i love it. i shared it in my staff meeting earlier this week and everyone resonated very strongly with it. it's very thought-provoking - that's what good quotes do. Thank you sharing it! looking forward to more of such quotes in this website. keep it up!
